'''Garlic Baguette''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be bought from [[Louis]] in [[Vasari Passage]] of [[Court of Fontaine]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Garlic Baguette increases all party members' attack by '''66'''/'''81'''/'''95''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Cooking
|Flour = 4
|Butter = 2
